He is also interested in the economic impact of the meat industry on the Argentine economy and the impact of the industry on the lives of the workers who are employed in it. He has a strong work ethic and is dedicated to improving the efficiency and quality of meat processing operations. He is also interested in the health and safety of workers in the industry and has a passion for finding ways to improve working conditions.
